pullRequest.title: Issue #1404: Implemented tests for ToolGroupApiService
pullRequest.bodyText: This PR is related to issue #1404 and contains tests implementation for ToolGroupApiService

nodes.bodyText: Maybe  you can replace 1 with something like private static final int READ_PERMISSION for better readability (as I did in the tests on DataStorageApiService). Or, in case you only check the READ permission mask, you can replace 1 with AclPermission.READ.getMask() (as it done in the Gitlab project). The same at line 195.

To my mind it would be better to overload the method?
Could we add final to method arguments?
Could you please remove an extra empty line?
Could you add test for AclTree annotation for this test class too?

afterCommit.message: Issue #1404: Added common methods fro AclTree tests

nodes.bodyText: Could we add assertion for tool mask?

commit.message: Issue #1404: ToolGroupApiService moved to acl package, existing ToolGroupApiServiceTest removed
Issue #1404: Added common methods fro AclTree tests
